text: I'm Sazia Khan and I've joined Accenture as a Senior Consulting Security Analyst.
Before joining the re/Start program, I was working in a hotel
as a guest service officer.
But then COVID happened and after that my job was affected.
So I just started looking for an option that could secure my job
in another field and give my kids a better future.
I got interested in security while watching movies
and seeing all these cyber attacks and then a good guy comes
and saves the world kind of thing.
My husband introduced this program to me last year
and I'm really thankful that he did because I got to learn a lot.
After completing AWS re/Start program I have joined Accenture
as a Senior Consulting Security Analyst
and I've been working on various projects on health
building roadmaps and systems.
One year back...
No one can imagine me doing this,
however, one year later I can see myself...
knowing so much about IT and I'm really happy
and the whole experience was life changing.
